request.description: Implement Phase 5 from PLAN_VALIDATION_ROBUSTNESS_FIXES_20251208: (5.1) Add explicit targetContacts to TransformedSet interface in convex/types/workoutTypes.ts and update createTransformedSets helper in convex/workoutLogsModules/helpers.ts. (5.2) Create Zod validation schema in src/lib/validation/exerciseSchema.ts with setFormDataSchema and programmedTargetsSchema. Test with browser agents on WorkoutLogger contacts-based exercises (Pogo's). Document completion in Serena memory.
